vocabinfos.mediumDef:
: drive out
1) to drive out, expel, cast out, drive away, divorce, put away, thrust away, trouble, cast up
1a) (Qal) to thrust out, cast out
1b) (Niphal) to be driven away, be tossed
1c) (Piel) to drive out, drive away
1d) (Pual) to be thrust out
Also means: ga.rash (גָּרַשׁ ": divorce" H1644H)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) qal   echar fuera, desterrar; (b) nif.   ser ahuyentado; (c) pi.   echar fuera; (d) pu.   ser ahuyentado
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 趕走, 驅逐
1a) (Qal) 逼走, 趕出
1b) (Niphal) 被驅離, 被拋開
1c) (Piel) 趕走, 驅離
1d) (Pual) 被逼走
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 赶走, 驱逐
1a) (Qal) 逼走, 赶出
1b) (Niphal) 被驱离, 被抛开
1c) (Piel) 赶走, 驱离
1d) (Pual) 被逼走
vocabinfos._stepDetailLexicalTag: [["meaning","H1644G","to drive out: drive out",38,"גָּרַשׁ"],["meaning","H1644H","to drive out: divorce",9,"גָּרַשׁ"]]
